channel.title: Bank Pin- I havei t all set up but whaat?- Also Items able to drop
channel.description:
Hello, i really need to know how to make item's be visable once dropped by a player. I have a 317. I think it's delta. Not sure. But i can't drop items. = No dro partys
Also, i have everything coded for a bank pin. character-pin = 9999 , But everytime i set it, it says wrong pin. Does anyone know how to fix this ?. And does anyone know if it's possible to make an NPC Be able to set up a bank pin. Instead of manually having to do it ? Kthankss

item.title: Bank Pin- I havei t all set up but whaat?- Also Items able to drop

Have you looked around for a tutorial?
